summary: This is a brief email from an unknown sender to OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) providing contact information for the SDNY (Southern District of New York) point of contact for the Epstein case. It identifies the lead prosecutor as AUSA Maurene Comey.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Identified as the SDNY point of contact for the Epstein case, with contact information provided.

keyFacts: The email is dated February 8, 2019, during the period of renewed investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
It identifies AUSA Maurene Comey as the SDNY point of contact for the Epstein case.
The correspondence is directed to OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility), suggesting internal DOJ communication regarding the case.
